id: 19 Hilarious/Wholesome Moments From This Month That'll Make You Not Hate This Wretched World
paragraph:
We all kinda need these rn.
        Saw this at petsmart today...Twitter help, idk who these two are but I hope this finds them. I took this at Taft Point at Yosemite National Park, on October 6th, 2018. https://t.co/Rdzy0QqFbYConejito nace sin orejas y su dueña le hace unas.My dog just got surgery because he tore a ligament in his knee so they had to shave him and now you can see his lil butt crack https://t.co/SNX0QnQqwRJoeys upset that the cat pajama-jam won’t be happening HAHAHAHA 😂 @joshgnosisMy parents’ cat inexplicably LOVES peaches, and it’s the most delightful thing. They send regular picture updates to the family group chat of this cat just chilling with the peaches. It’s the most important notification I get to my phone. https://t.co/mPEQaRF8MvI'm at a wedding and they went with a Gritty cake, so rest assured that there is ONE thing in this universe that isn't garbage trash https://t.co/OEajyvsNFXI fuckin lost it when he started “walkin wit a limp” 😂😭😭😭💀Earlier I told him I was hungry & he really surprised me with everything I was craving... what did I do to deserve this man 😩 https://t.co/GUk1Og2AGgWhat it takes to get a magical photo....I don't usually yell at my kids. But he deserved it.I figured I’d bring it to Twitter now. My sweet little nugget made 5 months 🐔❤️I’m Max’s dog sitter and max was very happy to see me today🤗I’m a school photographer and we got to take a service dog’s picture for the yearbook today 😭😭😭BuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
